author: chrisb
post: On Shroudscope I measure 109mm from the tip of the middle finger to the top of the major knuckles. That is based on the lower hand as the one on top doesn’t appear flat like the lower one. My corresponding finger is about 95mm. On the upper hand, I measure about 45mm from the knuckles to the top of the blood mark. That would position it on my hand in the centre of the lower hand. My conclusion is that the Man on the Shroud has very strangely shaped hands. Or perhaps mine are?.
